title: AAAI 2026 NSF Student Travel Award
description: Received NSF Student Travel Award to attend and present at the AAAI 2026 conference.

title: 2025 NSF CPS Rising Stars
description: Selected to participate (17% acceptance rate) for the NSF Cyber-Physical Systems Rising Stars Workshop at Vanderbilt University, recognizing research excellence and academic leadership potential.

title: IEEE/ACM CHASE 2024 NSF Travel Award (Grant)
description: Honored for research excellence and presentation in Wilmington, Delaware. Received the NSF Travel Award, acknowledging the high esteem of the accepted paper.

title: Vanderbilt Awards for Doctoral Discovery (VADD)
description: Awarded for research excellence and presentation in Wilmington, Delaware, at Vanderbilt University.

title: ICCPS 2024 NSF Travel Grant
description: Recognized for research excellence to travel to Hong Kong to further develop research skill in the domain of Cyber-Physical System.

title: UbiComp/ISWC 2023 Travel Grant
description: Recognized for the research work and presented at Cancun, Mexico for accepted paper.

title: Vanderbilt University Travel Grant
description: Recognized for the research work in the intersection of physical therapy and AI, traveling to present the work in 2023.

title: Magna Cum Laude
description: Recognized for academic excellence by Donald Bren School of Information and Computer Science at UC Irvine.

title: Specialization in Intelligent Systems
description: Achieved specialization through dedicated coursework and projects at UC Irvine.

title: Dean's Honor List
description: Consistently maintained high GPA to be recognized on the Dean's List at UC Irvine.
